item.title: home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[form_control.text label="Field Group Title" addon_text="it is shown in the Field group list" required="yes" field="ID" class="form-md" id="field_title"/] [form_control.text label="GT Block Slug" addon_text="it is name given while registering GT Block" required="yes" field="ID" class="form-md" id="gt_block_title"/] [form_control.textarea label="GT Block Slug" addon_text="it is name given while registering GT Block" required="yes" field="ID" class="form-md" rows=10 cols=80 id="awesome_code"/]
[form_control.button type="submit" value="Create ACF Entry"/]
[session_ticket.create nonce=yes set=module.ticket_id/] [session_ticket.set_activity {module.ticket_id} collection='{module.collection}' module='{module.slug}.save_data' /] [/templates.add] [templates.add save_data] [request.get awesome_code m.stripslashes_deep=t o.set='template.awcode' /] [code.run template.awcode o.set='template.waste'/] [php.uniqid p1= 'group_' o.set=template.group_key /] [template.set acf.key='{template.group_key}' /]Â  [template.set acf.title='{request.field_title}' /] [loop.@acf_fields template.data] [if.arr @acf_fields.item] [loop.@acf_item_fields @acf_fields.item] [env.get @acf_item_fields.index m.number_to_word=yes o.set='template.item_postfix'/] [loop.@acf_item @acf_item_fields.item] [php.uniqid p1= 'field_' o.set=template.field_key /] [arr.create o.set='template.acf.fields.new'] [key][template.field_key /][/key] [label][aw2.get @acf_item.key m.sentence=true /] [template.get item_postfix /][/label] [name][aw2.get @acf_item.key]_[template.get item_postfix /][/name] [type]text[/type] [instructions][/instructions] [required]0[/required] [conditional_logic]0[/conditional_logic] [wrapper] [width][/width] [class][/class] [id][/id] [/wrapper] [default_value][/default_value] [placeholder][/placeholder] [prepend][/prepend] [append][/append] [maxlength][/maxlength] [/arr.create] [/loop.@acf_item] [/loop.@acf_item_fields] [/if.arr] [if.else] [php.uniqid p1= 'field_' o.set=template.field_key /] [arr.create o.set='template.acf.fields.new'] [key][template.field_key /][/key] [label][aw2.get @acf_fields.key m.sentence=true /][/label] [name][aw2.get @acf_fields.key][/name] [type]text[/type] [instructions][/instructions] [required]0[/required] [conditional_logic]0[/conditional_logic] [wrapper] [width][/width] [class][/class] [id][/id] [/wrapper] [default_value][/default_value] [placeholder][/placeholder] [prepend][/prepend] [append][/append] [maxlength][/maxlength] [/arr.create] [/if.else] [/loop.@acf_fields] [arr.create o.set='template.acf_locations.new'] [param]block[/param] [operator]==[/operator] [value]acf/[request.get gt_block_title /][/value] [/arr.create] [template.get acf_locations o.set='template.acf.location.new' /] [template.set acf.menu_order='0' /] [template.set acf.position='normal' /] [template.set acf.style='default' /] [template.set acf.label_placement='top' /] [template.set acf.instruction_placement='label' /] [template.set acf.hide_on_screen='' /] [template.set acf.active='true' /] [template.set acf.description='' /] //** [php.header p1='Content-disposition: attachment; filename=file.json' /] [php.header p1='Content-type: application/json' /] **// [env.echo template.data c.ignore=true /] [env.get template.acf m.json_encode=true c.ignore=true/] [php.acf_import_field_group p1={template.acf} /] [/templates.add]
